data.name: adwise_title
data.value: More information about Adwise University coming soon

data.name: contacto_p1
data.value: Thank you for visiting the Adwise Corporate Advisory page!

data.name: contacto_p11
data.value: We look forward to the opportunity to work with you and help you achieve your business goals. Contact us today!

data.name: contacto_p2
data.value: At Adwise Corporate Advisory, we are committed to providing excellent customer service and top-quality advice. If you have any questions, concerns, or comments, please do not hesitate to contact us.

data.name: contacto_p3
data.value: To do so, you can fill out the contact form on our website. Simply enter your name, email address, and a detailed message, and one of our corporate advisory experts will get back to you as soon as possible.

data.name: contacto_p4
data.value: You can also contact us through our telephone numbers.

data.name: contacto_rta_error
data.value: We're sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again later or contact us directly via email.

data.name: contacto_rta_exito_h2
data.value: Your message has been successfully sent!

data.name: contacto_rta_exito_p
data.value: Here are the details of the message:

data.name: finance_descr
data.value: These are essential areas of business management responsible for financial management, financial control, and the independent evaluation of a company's financial situation. Finance encompasses financial planning, budget and treasury management, investment and financing, and the preparation of financial reports. On the other hand, auditing focuses on the independent review and evaluation of the company's financial statements. Both areas are crucial for ensuring the sustainability and financial health of the company.

data.name: finance_p_1
data.value: Integrated financial and accounting advisory services focused on improving financial management.

data.name: finance_p_2
data.value: Methodologies for the independent and systematic evaluation of financial and administrative information and processes

data.name: finance_p_3
data.value: Systems for integration, consolidation, and financial information across multiple businesses, accounting, and territories

data.name: finance_p_4
data.value: Strategies for innovating and optimizing common resources and processes, enhancing operational effectiveness and competitiveness.

data.name: finance_p_5
data.value: Programs for specialized assessment of compliance with specific regulations and the effectiveness of the internal control system

data.name: indexArea_descr
data.value: Adwise specializes in various business areas, including talent management, process innovation, finance and auditing, and outsourcing. Each of these areas is crucial for the long-term success and competitiveness of a company.

data.name: indexArea_p_1
data.value: It focuses on attracting, developing, motivating, and retaining highly skilled and committed employees to contribute to the company's success.

data.name: indexArea_p_2
data.value: It refers to improving business processes to increase efficiency, productivity, and the quality of products or services offered.

data.name: indexArea_p_3
data.value: Finance and auditing are essential to ensuring the sustainability and financial health of the company.

data.name: indexArea_p_4
data.value: It is used to reduce costs, improve efficiency, and access specialized skills.

data.name: index_card1Content
data.value: As a consulting firm, we focus on providing innovative and personalized solutions to help our clients achieve their business goals. Here are some of our most prominent success stories.

data.name: index_card2Content
data.value: Adwise University is a High-Level Executive Training Center that offers an academic program focused on the successful implementation of Digital Transformation in Governments, Financial Institutions, and International Cooperation Organizations. With us, you will receive high-quality training to lead the change towards a more digital and efficient future in your organization.

data.name: index_PHeader
data.value: Specialized consultancy in Education, Human Capital Management, Innovation, Organizational Development, Change Management, Outsourcing, and Talent Development Programs

data.name: nosotros_crecimiento_li1
data.value: It's about seeking growth as individuals and as professionals.

data.name: nosotros_crecimiento_li2
data.value: It's about creating a work environment that allows us to feel happy and fulfilled every day at work.

data.name: nosotros_crecimiento_li3
data.value: It involves continually improving working conditions.

data.name: nosotros_ejecucion_li2
data.value: It's about always going one step further.

data.name: nosotros_excelencia_li1
data.value: It's about doing things right the first time.

data.name: nosotros_Max1
data.value: Max Santamaría Gutiérrez is the CEO and Senior Partner of ADWISE Corporate Advisory for Latin America, with over 20 years of experience in the market. He holds a degree in Psychology from the University of Costa Rica and has specialized in Negotiation, Training in Education for Human Development, and International Counseling in Group Process Psychology.

data.name: nosotros_Max2
data.value: He has conducted research in areas such as Artificial Intelligence, Human Resources Scorecard, Corporate Development, Digital Transformation, Leadership Awareness, Emotional Intelligence, Productivity Management Systems, and Neuro-Linguistic Programming in organizations.

data.name: nosotros_Max3
data.value: He has worked as a consultant in Latin America for companies across various sectors and business clusters, including consumer goods, oil, packaging, agribusiness, services, banking, technology, construction, manufacturing, exports, security, trading, NGOs, real estate development, and many others.

data.name: nosotros_mision_descr
data.value: We provide comprehensive business advisory solutions with a focus on profitability.

data.name: nosotros_rentabilidad_li1
data.value: It's about focusing on results, not activities.

data.name: nosotros_rentabilidad_li2
data.value: It's about being effective and efficient.

data.name: nosotros_rentabilidad_li3
data.value: It's about doing more with the least amount of resources.

data.name: nosotros_timeline_3
data.value: Multinationals in Central America and the Caribbean

data.name: nosotros_transparencia_li1
data.value: It means being ethical and loyal to our clients, collaborators, suppliers, allies, and our company.

data.name: nosotros_transparencia_li2
data.value: It involves open communication among collaborators.

data.name: nosotros_vision_descr
data.value: We will be the main strategic allies of our clients.

data.name: outsourcing_descr
data.value: El outsourcing es la contratación de una empresa externa para realizar tareas o funciones empresariales que normalmente se llevan a cabo dentro de la organización. Puede aplicarse a una amplia gama de áreas como contabilidad, marketing, soporte técnico y gestión de recursos humanos. Las empresas utilizan el outsourcing para reducir costos, mejorar la eficiencia y acceder a habilidades especializadas. Sin embargo, también puede conllevar desventajas como la pérdida de control y la posible disminución en la calidad del trabajo. En resumen, el outsourcing es una práctica empresarial con pros y contras.

data.name: outsourcing_p_1
data.value: Personnel outsourcing services, temporary or permanent

data.name: outsourcing_p_2
data.value: Development of state-of-the-art productivity technology applications

data.name: outsourcing_p_3
data.value: Administrative processing and customer service in outsourced payrolls

data.name: outsourcing_p_4
data.value: Administration services and execution of non-core functions for our clients' business.

data.name: outsourcing_p_5
data.value: Solution that ensures end-to-end full package deliverables in accordance with a Service Level Agreement.

data.name: perfiles_descr
data.value: Welcome to our section where we show some of our projects. Here we present some of our most outstanding success stories. As a consulting firm, we focus on providing innovative and customized solutions to help our clients achieve their business objectives. Our highly skilled team is committed to delivering exceptional results and client satisfaction.

data.name: perfiles_proyecto_1_li1
data.value: Manage the recruitment and training of 100 Senior Service Executives.

data.name: perfiles_proyecto_2_li1
data.value: Savings of $250,000 in the Supply Chain macro-process (logistics - commercial).

data.name: perfiles_proyecto_3_li1
data.value: Transformation of the Commercial Strategy in the integration process of Argentina, Chile & Uruguay.

data.name: perfiles_proyecto_4_li1
data.value: Human Capital Alignment and Management Strategy for a business group of 4,000 employees in Honduras, 2010.

data.name: perfiles_proyecto_5_li1
data.value: Leading the strategic transition, Costa Rica + Mex 2010.

data.name: perfiles_proyecto_6_li1
data.value: Redesign of the talent management model, with reorganization (strengthening) of the commercial area, mobilizing more than 80 people monthly.

data.name: processInovation_descr
data.value: Process Innovation refers to the creation or improvement of business processes to increase efficiency, productivity and quality of products or services offered. It involves reorganizing tasks, implementing new technologies, improving training and eliminating unnecessary processes to improve customer satisfaction, reduce costs and improve adaptability to market change. Process innovation is important to maintain competitiveness and long-term sustainability, improve efficiency and reduce business costs.

data.name: processInovation_p_1
data.value: Continuous improvement system focused on standardization in accordance with international norms.

data.name: processInovation_p_2
data.value: Methodology for project planning, management and control through a PMI-compliant execution system.

data.name: processInovation_p_3
data.value: Design and implementation of management information systems for decision making.

data.name: processInovation_p_4
data.value: Change management programs for performance and strategy alignment

data.name: processInovation_p_5
data.value: Program to generate profitability by optimizing processes, reducing costs and improving efficiencies.

data.name: talentManagement_descr
data.value: Talent Management is the set of practices and processes used by organizations to attract, develop, motivate and retain highly qualified and committed employees who contribute significantly to the success of the company. Companies that implement an effective talent management strategy are more likely to retain and attract top talent, improve overall performance and remain competitive over the long term in a changing marketplace.

data.name: talentManagement_p
data.value: Competency-based recruiting system and management indicators

data.name: talentManagement_p_2
data.value: Job satisfaction and stakeholder opinion measurement program for change

data.name: talentManagement_p_3
data.value: Evaluation system to identify gaps in a person's competencies versus the position.

data.name: talentManagement_p_4
data.value: Personalized counseling in the development of competencies to improve performance

data.name: talentManagement_p_5
data.value: Training program composed of five levels of execution of the SMART method

data.name: timeline_2006_text
data.value: The firm started in 2006 with offices in Costa Rica and a focus on human capital solutions for the region.

data.name: timeline_2008_text
data.value: In 2008, the company began to offer new solutions in other business areas, specifically in the field of process optimization. It opened its first offices outside Costa Rica in Panama and Trinidad and Tobago, implemented high-level training for SM JALEEL in Trinidad and Tobago, and shared other coaching initiatives in the Dominican Republic.

data.name: timeline_2009_h2
data.value: Transnationals in Central America and the Caribbean

data.name: timeline_2009_text
data.value: In 2009, the firm focused on transnational companies in Central America and the Caribbean and designed the strategy that led TETRA PAK Central America & Caribbean to win the global "Market Region of the Year 2008" award.

data.name: timeline_2010.5_text
data.value: The firm brought in new consultants and managers in 2010 and was able to complete an optimization project with significant savings in the supply chain for TETRA PAK in Panama.

data.name: timeline_2010_text
data.value: In 2010, the firm opened a branch in Bogota, Colombia and incorporated the quality division, developing new business solutions in each of its areas of expertise. It also began working with Scotiabank in Panama and Costa Rica on outsourcing and headhunting projects.

data.name: timeline_2011_text
data.value: In 2011, the Firm began operating under the ADWISE brand, strengthening and diversifying its solutions in accordance with market needs and expanding its physical presence to Central and South America and the Caribbean through representative offices and a commercial operations center in Miami, Florida.

data.name: timeline_2013_text
data.value: In 2013, ADWISE is awarded by Scotiabank Costa Rica to successfully implement an Outsourcing project managing more than 60 resources for the bank and takes on Managed Payroll projects for SCOTIABANK in Panama and Costa Rica.

data.name: timeline_2015_text
data.value: As of 2015, the Firm's Head Office is relocated to Panama City, where its Expertise Delivery Center is located. In the short and medium term the firm will continue to strengthen and diversify its solutions, in accordance with market needs and expanding its physical presence to Central America, South America and the Caribbean. The Firm currently has partners in Latin America, United States & Spain.
